name: The Grave Digger
description: Take control of shovel-master Fagus in this curious blend of whimsical English comedy and grim Dickensian horror.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or above Processor: 1.0 GHz or above with SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Terrible voice acting and awful writing. Tries to be funny but isn't. The gameplay itself is boring and repetitive. No thanks.
